Title: Honeydew
Writer: Stacy Osei-Kuffour, Christopher Storer, Sofya Levitsky-Weitz
Actors: Jeremy Allen White, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ayo Edebiri
Plot: While in Denmark for an internship with chef Luca, Marcus tries to challenge himself through the preparation of a series of new dishes that could benefit the restaurant.
